about_the_game:
Year 2080. Humanity managed to achieve the SDGs of the 2030 Agenda, thanks to the artificial intelligence created by UN computer scientists!

Now androids are in charge of ecological production systems and taking care of the planet.

Or are they?

A first person narrative adventure set in a distopic future. Advance trough the futuristic factory OF-1, solve puzzles, evade the other androids and uncover its hidden secrets.

Your role as an android of the R06-ER series, on your first day as a worker at The Factory, is to preserve the well-being and prosperity of planet Earth.
You are programmed to follow the protocol and instructions of the supervising AI and will go from room to room, completing assigned tasks. If you see strange messages or signs, ignore them; the new update is causing issues and some androids may malfunction.
Just follow the protocol, complete your shift, and a comforting oil bath awaits you!

A good Roger follows orders!

Features:

  • Explore a futuristic environment with synthwave aesthetics: Immerse yourself in a vibrant, retro-futuristic world that combines visual elements of synthwave.
  • Dubbed in Catalan, with a retrowave soundtrack: Enjoy a fully immersive experience with Catalan voiceovers and a soundtrack that evokes the retrowave style.
  • First-person narrative experience: Live the story from your character’s perspective, feeling like a part of the game world.
  • Learn about sustainability and ethics in ecological production: Through the narrative, discover the importance of sustainable and ethical practices in production.
  • Complete tasks assigned by the factory’s AI: Solve puzzles and explore different areas of the factory while following the instructions of the supervising AI.

name: One Paradox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A first-person narrative adventure set in a dystopian future. Advance through the futuristic OF-1 factory, solve puzzles, evade other androids, and uncover its hidden secrets.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Catalan*
*languages with full audio support
